UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved availability and access of quality primary education, especially for girls and children of identified vulnerable groups (people living in areas affected by armed conflicts and or emergency situation, nomads, orphans disabled)
